response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. Given its importance and the unique features it offers, we are extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We understand its worth to you might be around $800,000, but this offer aims to create a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
